title: Olympic National Park: Vacation VIPs
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer     Vacation VIPs              Vacation VIPs        Summer 2016 Vacation Volunteers takes place on the Olympic coast every Saturday from 10:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m., June 25 - September 3. Check park bulletin boards for weekly location information or call the Kalaloch Ranger Station at 360-962-2283  Â     The Vacation VIPs program invites folks visiting the park to give back by removing trash along Olympic NP's scenic beaches. The program offers opportunities for learning through giving back, all while leaving a beautiful place cleaner than it was found. Summer of 2016 will offer more opportunities to capture the hearts of civic-minded visitors by expanding the Vacation VIPs program. Look at the summer Bugler or call the volunteer office at 360-565-3142 for more information and to sign up.
